name: Intergalactic Singles Night
description:
Intergalactic Singes Night is a surreal dating simulator with choices, romance, and fun minigames! It was made for the Godot Wild Jam 48, and all of the art, programming, and writing was done by me.

see the git page for music credits, and the source code of the game

Minigame How To

both games are controlled with the arrow keys.

In the blackjack game, the goal is simply to rack up as many wins as possible, right arrow is hit, left arrow is stay. I wanted this game to have more going on, but time constraints made it a bit more of a tech demo, its also pretty broken :p.

In the shooting gallery game, hold the arrow keys to specify which target you are aiming at, and press the spacebar to shoot. If no keys are held, it will snap back to the center.
